description: Detects a suspicious command line execution that includes an URL and AppData string in the command line parameters as used by several droppers (js/vbs > powershell) Author: Florian Roth, Jonhnathan Ribeiro, oscd.community. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
name: Command Line Execution with Suspicious URL and AppData Strings
query: (process.executable:*\\cmd.exe AND process.command_line:*http* AND process.command_line:*\:\/\/* AND process.command_line:*%AppData%*)
